content.webTitle: Strike a balance: Philip Olivier, actor

fields.headline: Strike a balance
fields.bodyText: At the moment there is a masseuse laid on for us, so I try to have two massages a week - it's very important, what with all the training; it helps to get toxins out of the muscles. It's also free. I am a bit competitive. I can't help it. If I can't compete in an event because I am not very good, then I think it is crap and tell everyone it's crap. I don't mean it, though. Like with tennis: I am always telling people tennis is crap, but really it's because I can't play it. Kev from Liberty X is definitely going to be my biggest rival - he's changed so much. When we started, he had a big belly and now he has a washboard stomach and is really strong. But I don't think appearance is important to me; I don't think about things like that. I had the biggest bouffant you've ever seen until I got it cut a couple of days ago · Philip Olivier appears in Channel 4's The Games. The finale is tonight.
